metadata.title: Hallmark Keepsake Spring Ornament Spring Takes Flight 2017
features: Manufactured by Hallmark. Will compliment all seasons including Spring and Easter decor
description: With unparalleled artistry and exceptional detail, each festive and collectible Keepsake Ornament is made for years of celebrations. From preserving precious memories to commemorating special milestones and interests, there's a Hallmark ornament for everyone on your gift list.
